guest_info.name: Ali Garced
guest_info.title: Real Estate Agent
guest_info.production_level: Agents on her crew earned six figures in eight months

main_topics: Importance of Google Business for lead generation

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Generating leads without paying for ads
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Utilize a Google Business page to rank high in search results and generate leads organically.
Ask clients how often they expect to hear from you and set clear boundaries for communication.
Use Trello and CRMs like kvCORE to organize client information and follow-ups.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides detailed checklists and systems to streamline the selling process and increase efficiency.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Implementing structured checklists can significantly boost productivity and client satisfaction.

target_avatars.relevance: Ali shares insights on how her team members have increased their earnings by using her systems.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Sharing effective systems and processes with your team can lead to substantial financial growth.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: If you do not have your Google Business page, you are missing out on the number one website in the world, which is free.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Highlights a free, actionable tactic for lead generation.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Are you leveraging the most powerful free tool for real estate leads?

clip_worthy_moments.quote: I now have a $3,000 cancellation fee... We are professionals, there's no reason that attorneys should be paid beforehand and we shouldn't.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Challenges the norm of working without upfront compensation.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Why you should consider charging a cancellation fee in real estate.

key_tactics.tactic: Use a Google Business page for organic lead generation.
key_tactics.context: Set up and verify your Google Business page to rank in local searches.

key_tactics.tactic: Implement a structured checklist for seller interactions.
key_tactics.context: Use Trello to organize the seller process from pre-listing to post-transaction.

key_tactics.tactic: Charge a cancellation fee to protect upfront investments.
key_tactics.context: Include a $3,000 cancellation fee in your listing agreement to cover costs.

quotable_insights: Sharing effective systems and processes can lead to substantial financial growth.
Implementing structured checklists can significantly boost productivity and client satisfaction.

resources_mentioned.name: Google Business
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended for generating leads without paying for ads.

resources_mentioned.name: Trello
resources_mentioned.context: Used for organizing the seller checklist and process.

resources_mentioned.name: kvCORE
resources_mentioned.context: CRM used for managing client information and follow-ups.

episode_summary: In this episode, Ali Garced shares her detailed seller checklist process, emphasizing the importance of using a Google Business page for lead generation and setting clear client expectations. She provides actionable insights on pre-listing preparation and handling listing presentations effectively, while also advocating for a cancellation fee to protect upfront investments.
